record.field: Dear ${approver_name}. Based on the Overtime request ${name}. Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for Overtime period ${start_date} to ${end_date} This notification serves as confirmation that your overtime request has been approved.
Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request to Overtime period ${start_date} to ${end_date} This notification serves as confirmation that your overtime request has been rejected.
